MLModelFactor.name: MLModelFactor
MLModelFactor.description: Represents a field value that has a positive or negative effect on the modelâ€™s score.

Correlation.description: Shows the strength of association between the variable and the outcome. The higher the correlation, the greater the association.

Importance.description: Shows how much the variable influences the outcome. The higher the value, the greater the impact.

ModelId.description: The ID of the related model.

Name.description: The automatically generated ID that uniquely identifies the model.

Weight.description: Indicates how significant the field value is to the outcome or score. Model factlets tend to have higher weights than model factors.
